item.title: Live: 22 new Covid cases in community as Cabinet meets on alert level
item.description:
There are 22 new cases of Covid-19 in the community today as Cabinet meets to decide on whether to lift Auckland's lockdown.
Of these, 17 are linked to known cases, while five are unlinked. There are ...

item.title: How many MPs have been fully vaccinated against Covid?
item.description:

Meanwhile, nearly half of Parliament's 120 members are now fully vaccinated. The rest have received ...
